name: CS GO Case Simulator
description:
The aim of the game is to simulate a real-life Counter Strike case opening.
You earn virtual currency called Money for which you can BUY and SELL Skins. You can also BUY and OPEN CASES with keys to draw various skins and collect them! The prices of the items, skins, cases and keys are updated straight from STEAM. Thanks to this you can enjoy a real moment of thrill, just like in cs!
Play the game every day to receive awesome Daily Rewards. You can also take advantage of many different free bonuses.

▸ Counter Strike Global Offensive case simulator!
▸ Earn virtual money by doing various TASKS
▸ Get more MONEY by TAPPING like in a CLICKER game!
▸ Realistic OPENING SOUNDS!
▸ ALL SKINS from STEAM MARKET!
▸ Quick SKIN PRICES updating from STEAM MARKET!
▸ FULL HD game and SKINS graphics!
▸ ...and much more!

Disclaimer:
The money used in this game is 100% virtual currency, it can not be exchanged for real money/currencies or material/virtual goods. The skins you own in this game can not be exchanged for skins in any of the CS games. The purpose of this game is only to simulate online CS roulettes, no real money or skins involved.
